Title: A Big Little Idea Called Ergodicity (Or The Ultimate Guide to Russian Roulette)
Description: Ergodicity - the average outcome of the group is the same as the average outcome of the individual over time.

Title: The Overcast Redesign: Part One – Marco.org
A thanks to the traits working group in 2021
Description: So…this is awkward. I wanted to write this post near the end of 2021 or beginning of 2022, but time got away from me, as it does so often. However, a half-completed draft has been open in my browser this entire time, and I think it’d be a shame for it to go to waste and not celebrate all the work done on traits working-group related things and to celebrate the people who have done that amazing work. Given that this is “unofficial” though, I’ll be a little less formal than I otherwise would if this was posted to the Inside Rust Blog.
